maqras.text: 26|111|Onon guftand: «Ojo ʙa tu imon ʙijovarem, dar hole ki [faqat] furumojagon] az tu pajravi kardaand?»
26|112|[Nuh] Guft: «Man ʙa on ci onon [dar guzasta] mekardand, ci donise doram
26|113|Hisoʙi onon tanho ʙo Parvardigori man ast. Agar mefahmed [cunin suxani gazofe nagued]
26|114|Va man [hargiz] mu'minonro tard [dur] namekunam
26|115|Man cuz ʙimdihandai oskor nestam»
26|116|Onon guftand: «Ej Nuh, agar [az da'vatat] dast ʙarnadori, hatman, sangsor mesavi»
26|117|U guft: «Parvardigoro, qavmam maro duruƣgu angostand
26|118|Pas, mijoni manu eson dovari kun va maro va mu'minonero, ki hamroham hastand, nacot ʙideh»
26|119|Pas, u va afrodero, ki hamrohas ʙudand, dar [on] kistii oganda [ pur az insonu hajvon] nacot dodem
26|120|Va ʙoqimondagonro ƣarq kardem
26|121|Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|122|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|123|[Qavmi] Od pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|124|On goh ki ʙarodarason Hud ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?”
26|125|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
26|126|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
26|127|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|128|Ojo ʙar har makoni ʙalande ʙinoe ʙehuda mesozed
26|129|Va qasrho va qal'ahoi muhkamu ustuvor ʙino mekuned, guijo [dar dunjo] covidonaed
26|130|Va cun [ʙa kase] hamlavar mesaved, [ʙerahm va] zolimona hamla mekuned
26|131|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
26|132|Va az kase parvo kuned, ki ʙa sumo [ne'mathoe cunon farovon] ato kardaast, ki xud [onhoro ʙehtar] medoned
26|133|U ʙa sumo cahorpojonu farzandon [-i ʙisjor] ato kardaast
26|134|Va ʙoƣho va casmasorho
26|135|Ba rosti, ki man az azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg ʙar sumo metarsam”
26|136|Onon guftand: “Ci moro pand ʙidihi, jo nadihi, ʙarojamon jakson ast [va az tu toat namekunem]
26|137|In [oini mo hamon] ravisi pesinijon ast
26|138|va mo [hargiz] azoʙ naxohem sud»
26|139|Pas, onon Hudro duruƣgu angostand. Pas, Mo [niz] halokason kardem. Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|140|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|141|[Qavmi] Samud pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|142|On goh ki ʙarodarason Soleh ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
26|143|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
26|144|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
26|145|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|146|Ojo [mepindored, ki] sumoro dar ne'mathoe, ki in cost, osuda raho mekunand
26|147|Dar [in] ʙoƣho va casmasorho
26|148|Va [dar kanori in] kistzorho va naxlhoe, ki mevahojas narmu rasidaast
26|149|Va mohirona az kuhho [ʙaroi xud] xonahoe metarosed
26|150|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|151|Va az isrofkoron [-i gunahgor] pajravi nakuned
26|152|[Hamon] Kasone, ki dar zamin ʙa fasod mepardozand va [xestanro] isloh namekunand”
26|153|Onon guftand: “[Ej Soleh] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
26|154|Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti, pas, agar rost megui, nisonae [ʙar pajomʙariat] ʙijovar”
26|155|[Soleh] Guft: «In modasuturest, ki sahme az oʙ [-i casma] dorad va [ruzhoi muajjane niz] sumo sahme az oʙ dored
26|156|Pas, [kamtarin] ozore ʙa on narasoned, ki azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg sumoro faro megirad”
26|157|Pas, onro [zaxmi kardand va] kustand va [on goh az kardai xud] pusajmon sudand
26|158|Pas, azoʙ [-i ilohi] ononro furu girift. Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|159|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|160|Qavmi Lut [niz] pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|161|On goh ki ʙarodarason Lut ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
26|162|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙare amin hastam
26|163|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|164|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|165|Az mardumi cahon ʙo mardon meomezed
26|166|va hamsaronero, ki Alloh taolo ʙarojaton ofaridaast, raho mekuned? Balki sumo guruhi mutacovized
26|167|Onon guftand: «Ej Lut, agar [az in amru nahj] dast ʙarnadori, hatman, [az sahr] ixroc mesavi»
26|168|[Lut] Guft: «Man dusmani [sarsaxti] in koraton hastam
26|169|Parvardigoro, man va xonavodaamro az [oqiʙati] on ci [inho] ancom medihand, nacot deh»
26|170|Pas, mo u va hamai xonavodaasro nacot dodem
26|171|Magar pirazane, ki dar mijoni ʙozmondagon [dar azoʙ] ʙud
26|172|Sipas digaronro noʙud kardem
26|173|Va ʙar onon ʙorone [az sang] ʙoronidem va ʙoroni ʙimdodasudagon ci ʙad ʙud
26|174|Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|175|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|176|Ashoʙi Ajka [niz] pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
26|177|On goh ki Suajʙ ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
26|178|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙare amin hastam
26|179|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed] va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|180|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
